Keywords: Animal , Avengers , Illuminati , Scientist , X-Factor , X-Men
Real Name: Dr. Hank McCoy
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Elevated
THROW ME INTO THE FRAY!: When Beast is carried, if no other friendly character has been placed this turn, after resolutions he may make a close attack using his printed combat values.

March 6, 2022
budweiserclix
Wendigo and this Beast might just be a super dangerous combo. Wendy can full carry Beast(or even better, charge flurry while carrying), Beast attacks and gives wounded token, Wendy can now sidestep and carries Beast and he attacks again. Then after the sidestep Wendy gets his free attack and gets Beast's empower. Play multiple Wendys and have them all come pick Beast up and bring the pain wherever they go. I'm excited to try this out.

Hellboy the Bellboy
@Just Some Coffee Bolts can now be used with close attacks as of the WW80 rulebook. Still have to split up the damage. Think of it like Beast making large swipes at a few guys in front of him.

December 23, 2021
Disasstah
One of the few pieces that can attack after being carried. Being able to empower someone that charges while carrying him is going to be very satisfying for one person at the table. I see a future where Sentry carries this fella around everywhere, like a big blue fuzzy PHD, beating fools for 10 damage a turn, and then Beast turns around and sees those who dare stand before them, mumbling "Oh my stars and garters." as he has now become a light object that can attack afterwards.

Goop
Combos well with the rare Colossus in this set as well as any other charge figure that can carry. Granting that empower while he can attack himself is a strong opener when used with the right team. He really should have had b/c/f though.
